class.name: AudioStreamPlaylist
class.brief_description: [AudioStream] that includes sub-streams and plays them back like a playslit.

method.name: get_bpm
method.description: Return the bpm of the playlist, which can vary depending on the clip being played.

method.name: get_list_stream
method.description: Get the stream at playback position index.

method.name: set_list_stream
method.description: Set the stream at playback position index.
